name: 20 Seconds To Protect The World!
description:
GAME MADE FOR THE 20 SECONDS GAME JAM

Protect the world!

This is my first game made on the godot engine and I hope it's playable ^^

Just survive for 20 seconds and have fun!

It should work better on windows or linux binaries instead of web version

Credits to: Kenney assets and textures.com
